values.help:
Customer function switch, using bit control.
                Bit0: Reserve.
                Bit1: Reserve.
                Bit2: Reserve => 1.
                Bit4: Notification Type (0: Notification Report, 1: Sensor Binary Report).
                Bit5: Reserve.
                Bit6: Reserve.
                Bit7: Reserve.
values.label: Customer Function

values.help:
The interval time for auto report the battery level.
                30 minutes per tick and minimum time is 30 minutes, default tick is 12 (6 hours)
values.label: Auto Report Battery Time
